channel.title: Osx on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Osx on Arrans github.io

item.title: sickcodes/Docker-OSX
item.description: Run macOS VM in a Docker! Run near native OSX-KVM in Docker! X11 Forwarding! CI/CD for OS X Security Research! Docker mac Containers.

item.title: Foundry376/Mailspring
item.description: 💌 A beautiful, fast and fully open source mail client for Mac, Windows and Linux.

item.title: sveinbjornt/Sloth
item.description: Mac app that shows all open files, directories, sockets, pipes and devices in use by all running processes. Nice GUI for lsof.

item.title: oOthkOo/whatsapp-desktop
item.description: Unofficial WhatsApp Desktop Client for OSX, Linux and Windows. Build with Electron.

item.title: inbucket/inbucket
item.description: Disposable webmail server (similar to Mailinator) with built in SMTP, POP3, RESTful servers; no DB required.
